title: At Orikhiv direction Russian army shelled Poltavka, Rivnopil, Charivne, Orikhiv, Pyatykhatky of Zaporizhzhia region. Russian ...
content: At Orikhiv direction Russian army shelled Poltavka, Rivnopil, Charivne, Orikhiv, Pyatykhatky of Zaporizhzhia region. Russian aviation conducted airstrikes at Makarivka, Staromayorske of Donetsk region, Malynivka of Zaporizhzhia region, - General Staff of Armed Forces of Ukraine says in the evening report
author: Live UA Map
